          <title>
            <string language="en">Angle of reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Winkel der Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Angle de réflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ângulo de reflexão</string>

          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows a light ray reflecting off a mirror that is fixed to a wall.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt einen hellen Strahl, der 
weg von einem Spiegel sich reflektiert, der an einer Wand befestigt 
wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre un rayon léger se reflétant
outre d'un miroir qui est fixé à un mur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra um raio claro que reflete 
fora de um espelho que seja reparado a uma parede.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra un raggio luminoso che 
riflette fuori di uno specchio che è riparato ad una parete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει ελαφριά ακτίνα 
απεικονίζοντας από έναν καθρέφτη που καθορίζεται σε έναν τοίχο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra un rayo ligero que refleja 
de un espejo que esté fijado a una pared.</string>
          </description>
